website_summaries.verdict: One of the best billiards table covers for the most amount of protection at an affordable price.
pros: Designed to be used on longer billiards tables without sacrificing any important surface coverage
Works well for other types of gaming tables
Cover slides on and off smoothly so it will not damage the table while taking it on or off
cons: Cover material is thinner than most table covers
Can easily rip from sharp objects

customer_reviews.title: What we needed
customer_reviews.text: We have cats that we try to protect our pool table from. They love to lay on it and bask in the sun that comes through in our pool table room. This is perfect for our needs. It's not expensive and can be easily replaced should my cats try to use this as a little scratch pad. It fit our table perfectly. And I love that it had weighted corners!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Linder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. We thought is would be cheap to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. We thought is would be cheap to put over our nice cover. It actually is fitted and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cearles

customer_reviews.title: Alright. Not as big as pictured. Expected something a little thicker. But good for $10
customer_reviews.text: For a $10 pool table cover.... I guess it's as good as to be expected. BUT does not cover half way down the sides of a pool table, as shown. Guess I probably should have measured first. But it does cover the wood which is good. Also, not as thick as I had expected. It is very thin. But it's no problem for my table downstairs either way. If you're looking for something thicker than two sheets of printer paper, go with something else. Also it's a soft plastic. Not anything super nice. But hey $10 for covering a pool table. Guess you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Tis acceptable
customer_reviews.text: If you have a cheaper pool table like I do, this is a fine cover. If you have a 5000 dollar pool table, get a nicer cover. This covers my pool table which is all I need it to do but it did get a small rip in it when it got caught on a corner putting it on. Inconvenient, but I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jon R.

customer_reviews.title: Simple cover
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it may be two long, as it is advertised for seven foot tables; my hockey table was only 6 ft. HOWEVER I feel like it was still perfectly fine for my length. Definitely a complaint is after taking it out it definitely has that stinky chemically/plastic smell to it. It is thin but does what I need it to do, which is cover the table and keep dust off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Dust off the Air Hockey Table - does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. Hard to review a cover that goes on top of a table but I'll give it a stab. My wife loves the air hockey table we got her but we did not want it to get dusty. We searched for covers and this showed up. I did not worry that it was for pool tables because we are about the same shape. It stays wrinkled but otherwise does a great job keeping out the dust.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fair cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover does the job but a thin material can rip easily . came shrink wrapped and worked right out of packaging but wrinkled like yesterday's shorts. I used a heat gun at about 2 to 3 inches away with out melting and moving steadily the wrinkles relax and you get a smooth hanging cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Great materials, durable, and fits/covers, I have two covers-one for my air hockey and one for my pool table...The product(s) arrived on time, as described by Amazon & manufacturer, it was shipped without issue, arrived within prescribed estimates, the packaging was undamaged, and the product itself was unmolested and made with quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: 007Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery but extremely disappointed. It was to small and the “ weighted edges” are a joke. It blows off with the slightest wind. I have paperweights to hold it down. The material feels like a rain jacket. I have a professional sized pool table and it barely covered it. Would return it but just don’t feel like dealing with the hassle especially during Covid.
customer_reviews.author: rphair

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing, my husband is a cancer survivor and don't want to expose him. Product contains chemicals that may cause cancer. And its cost to ship back is half the cost of the product. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tashian

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This cover is nice for the money. It's not real heavy or thick, but then again we're just covering up a pool table, not trying to keep out a driving rainstorm. Description says covers 7 - 9 ft tables, but mine is 8 ft, and there is not much left over after that. Maybe 12 - 14 inches total, so if you have a 9 ft table, you might want to find a little bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Heavener

customer_reviews.title: Nothing is cat-proof
customer_reviews.text: Had a cat foisted upon me. This cover was meant to keep cat hair off. She ruined it and the table within two weeks. The cover gets 4 stars for admirably taking on an impossible task. I fear she hears me typing this. I must spend my remaining time getting right with the FSM. Pasta be with you.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Cancer causing!!! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: We didn't even open this! Has a warning on the package that it can cause cancer and reproductive harm! How can anyone sell this? Will be sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rick

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for an indoor pool table.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight cover fits full size table perfectly. Weighted corners hold it in place. Just enough protection to keep dust and spills off the surface. Would not be cat claw or weather proof, but doesn't claim to be either.
customer_reviews.author: Donaldo

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Welll u get what u pay for that’s for sure. This thing is constantly tearing / ripping randomly. Very thin & I’m definitely looking for a thicker product soon This thing is definitely thinner than my shower curtain
customer_reviews.author: Beast Mode Life

customer_reviews.title: Good cover, durable material
customer_reviews.text: Good cover, durable material, reasonable price. It drapes nicely over my 6' pool table. It would be 5 stars, but it is like a vinyl shower curtain with magnet weights. Very creased where it was folded.
customer_reviews.author: Anson Eddy

customer_reviews.title: as advertised so far. great for air hockey table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our air hockey table, which works well for because it's really just a plastic sheet with weights in the corners. my kids can easily take it off and put it on without help. Only had a couple months so can't attest to the durability.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Why spend more ?
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most is that it was under $10 delivered to my house. Covers my pool table as good as one that is much more expensive. The tiny weights work fine in the house and keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha vanderkallen

customer_reviews.title: Great product !
customer_reviews.text: Great game table cover with weighted corners. Good quality and I like that the fact that it isn’t lined with fabric due to the fact we are using it for an air hockey table.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The material is overall great, this is being used for outside/sun protection has ...
customer_reviews.text: I should of measured our pool table, the cover barley reaches the end of the ping pong table. The material is overall great, this is being used for outside/sun protection has been outside for 3 months and has not faded in AZ sun. Be sure to measure your game table before ordering it may not cover like the image provided.
customer_reviews.author: Meapea

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok cover. I bought this for our air hockey table. It is easy to use and to take off and on. The plastic is a little thin and it smells horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The product pictures show a cover that is so big it hangs over the edge and sides of the ping pong table, but the actual product is NOT even big enough to cover the top of the table! The quality is very poor and it is a complete waste of money! BUYER BEWARE, this product is NOT as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: DRL

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our full size pool table. We like the coverage it provides all around. It is very easy to fold up and tuck away when using the table, but gives us just the protection we wanted for the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working for no reason
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Logitech trackball (same exact model) that I got from Amazon that had the same issue- the first fell a few times, so I figured it was that and bought a replacement- this one never once moved from it's permanent location, and it stopped working the same way- replaced batteries and nothing- just a dead trackball- no led indicators/not working. Very disappointed with Logitech- they used to be the premier brand, but apparently they lowered their quality standards and are not what they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: A good pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pool table cover for the money. It is large enough to cover the table easily. I would order this product again, if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Rapped delivery, great for a temp cover
customer_reviews.text: My boss was happy with it. Bought it for his pool table since they allowed us to reopen the bar we needed something to cover it since rules were charged for Covid-19 reopening business.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. We had similar one prior to dog attacking ours and ripping massive holes. This fit the bill and is keeping the dust and dog hair off of the billiards table.
customer_reviews.author: Wabih

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Tore easy only used a couple times. I Know it was cheap but not that cheap
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Feels durable. Easy to wipe down with a wet cloth. Has a chemical smell when first opened but doesn't linger long.
customer_reviews.author: Zach & Krista W.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase. Everyone who has played on this table expressed their pleasure. Putting this together was simple enough. This thing weighs 200+ lbs though... We had to open the box, then move the parts one by one. If I could buy it again, if buy a bigger table.
customer_reviews.author: manbearpig

customer_reviews.title: Thin
customer_reviews.text: It's really thin tore the first time we put it on
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to put over out pool table which it typically used for 40K a table top game. We put this over the pool table to protect it from damage. So far it is working great. No complaints. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lauds54311

customer_reviews.title: it is very thin, its ok for us because ...
customer_reviews.text: it is very thin, its ok for us because we are putting a heavy blanket over this one, this cover is more to keep anything wet from spilling on it which it should do but it is not a heavy cover that can be used by itself. You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: Thin and snaged when i placed a basket on top. Better off buying a tarp for same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great for just a quick cover up. Nothing fancy just plain but great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Covers table nicely. It seems like it will be durable but time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice, simple cover. It is thick enough that the wrinkles don't naturally smooth-out when coving the pool table. I think it will work well for us. I hope I don't get an opportunity to test its water resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jefferies

customer_reviews.title: Good protection cover to have
customer_reviews.text: Great pool table cover. Big enough to cover other large game tables. Like the weighted ends that keep it down!!
customer_reviews.author: JosephH

customer_reviews.title: Works for me, not very thick.
customer_reviews.text: Not very thick but does the job i intend it to do for my pool table.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 7FT Bar Table
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and easy for my Valley table. Hangs about 8" off all sides. Nice weighted corners to keep it down.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck V.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Thin, cheap plastic material. Better off spending a little more and getting something more studier that would last.
customer_reviews.author: Norah

customer_reviews.title: perfect size
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately needed to return it due to the health risk warning
customer_reviews.author: C. Antonio P.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Kinda of like a soft tarp. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L

customer_reviews.title: Great table cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to product my table felt from dust and this does just that!
customer_reviews.author: El Embry

customer_reviews.title: Thin, serves it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Serves it’s purpose of jeeping our cats from marking up the table however it rips easily. We have had to duct tape in several places. Will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done, it's not fancy and it wrinkles easily, but its basic and good for the money
customer_reviews.author: VK

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and won't last
customer_reviews.text: Definitely light weight. Would not reccomend if you really want to protect your table. This material is so thin that it is not meant to last. Material is like a plastic table cloth or poncho material. This tore within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Janisha

customer_reviews.title: Not cat proof!
customer_reviews.text: If my cat tried he would go right through it. Kind of what I expected for the price but other reviews said it was cat proof when it is clearly not.
customer_reviews.author: Jay why

customer_reviews.title: minimal, but works
customer_reviews.text: pinhole found. This is a shower curtain material, even has magnets in edges! It works, but its minimal
customer_reviews.author: Barnaby Truhouse

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. It replaced my older one that i paid $30 for and it’s all ripped up. This is better quality and cheaper. Way better.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I am actually very happy with it covers my new simonis until I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely Not a high end cover but neither is the price. I am actually very happy with it covers my new simonis until I can afford a nicer one
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly cheap and great for the price. Fits my 7 footer perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product ! I purchased two of them!
customer_reviews.author: Gtango

customer_reviews.title: ordered for a cover to use pool table for all ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered for a cover to use pool table for all the Thanksgiving goodies. The cover is generic just a big piece of vinyl. I have 8 foot table and it covered it perfectly(put some plywood on table first) No complaints, but it is nothing special either.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Stuck on stupid with amazon
customer_reviews.text: Boss like job /Delivery A+ Products A+ Service and price A+ Amazon A+ thanks. Ama. gang
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Works ok as an underlayer for our regular cover because ...
customer_reviews.text: Works ok as an underlayer for our regular cover because is to thin to stay in place wind will blow it off really quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L Diaz

customer_reviews.title: fits as advertised
customer_reviews.text: how it can be made and shipped for that price is beyond me
customer_reviews.author: Fred larsen

customer_reviews.title: The cover material was a little more like a tarp than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The cover material was a little more like a tarp than I expected. However, it does the trick, it covers my 9 Foot table. For the price it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, not the thickest material, but will get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: A good value for your $
customer_reviews.text: Works for what I needed it to Covers the pool table nicely. Keep the dust off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it needs to do...protect the pool table.
customer_reviews.author: karapg

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product if I had to buy it again I would buy it again don't hesitate to get one things you can do with squab
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a cover for our pool table to stop the cat from scratching it but didn’t want to spend a fortune. Great quality for the money- love how this has weighted corners!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: For $10 this is a great cover. I had a cheap plastic one before ...
customer_reviews.text: For $10 this is a great cover. I had a cheap plastic one before this one and the new one feels significantly better made and is a little thicker. I have an pro sized 8 ft table and this fits over it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: I read that it's very thin, but was surprised at how quickly my cat shredded parts of the covering. Still an "okay" value for the money, and serves my purpose, but wish it was a little more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: It's perfectly just right for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Durability good it was definitely worth the money and the thickness was just right
customer_reviews.author: Nadine jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice weights on corners
customer_reviews.text: The weights on the corners make this cover very stable.
customer_reviews.author: William G. Gillam

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dust off
customer_reviews.text: Works well, stays in place, but looks like a plastic trash bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ken King

customer_reviews.title: Great for normal use, sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice material, fit nicely. Seems to be put together well with sturdy stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money won’t hold up very good at all my cat jumped on it and it ripped a hole in it very thin material I don’t recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Just what I was looking for. Excellent price and great cover.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty table cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty table cover. It hangs down 10" on the sides which my other one did not do.
customer_reviews.author: PamK

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people dislike this cover so much, I love it. It does exactly what it's supposed to do. Keeps dust/debry off the table. It fits perfectly on my 7 ft billiard table. See picture. The price was amazing and you can't beat that. It is a thin plastic material, but what more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Quality, heavy vinyl cover fit perfectly over our 8-foot pool table. Looks very nice too. Quality item at a great price. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: The Next Chapter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 8 foot table good. I wish it had weighted sides, or just corners.
customer_reviews.author: B Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, good price
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, it ripped the first day we got it.
customer_reviews.author: HLM

customer_reviews.title: Pool table quickie
customer_reviews.text: Just the basic cover. It does the job and keeps dust from coming in contact with the felt
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good pool table cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my pool table and it works great
customer_reviews.author: James Bristol

customer_reviews.title: worse thuing ever
customer_reviews.text: worse thuing ever, material was ripped upon opening, quality was so poor, a $5.00 tarp is better made than this
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Balin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I brought it for my air hockey table to prevent dust going into holes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a super great table cover this is not it
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a super great table cover this is not it, but for the price it is the best you are going to find. Very happy with mine.
customer_reviews.author: CLYDE GILMORE

customer_reviews.title: don’t buy ..
customer_reviews.text: Revived it damaged ... Packaging looked like it was slit with a knife and cover had a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie parsons

customer_reviews.title: Fits but not as expected
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't even cover half the legs. So buy a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: seth wainright

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for but it does the job I needed it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: cover is easy to take on and off pool table, very light weight.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done protection against spills when not in use

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great on my 9 ft pool table. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Haenggi

customer_reviews.title: Tarp would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.text: This was very inexpensive but it should have lasted more than two times of being taken off our pool table. I should have just bought a tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

product_meta.title: EastPoint Sports Billiard Table Cover, Large
product_meta.description: The EastPoint Sports Billiard Table Cover is a great accessory to help you enhance your billiards experience. With its durable yet lightweight construction and weighted corners, you can protect your indoor billiard table from dust, debris, and scratches while ensuring that it stays put. The cover comfortably fits any table between 7 feet and 9 feet in length, accommodating a variety of billiard tables as well as tables for hover hockey or table tennis. Includes 1 large black billiard table cover.
feature_bullets: Cover for billiard tables to protect tabletops from dust and debris
The cover measures 10ft x 6ft – however we recommend it is used on tables 7ft – 9ft in length to allow the cover to drape and protect the edges of the table
Heavy-duty material with weighted corners ensures cover stays on
Great for other gaming tables, such as table tennis or hover hockey
Set includes: 1 large black billiard table cover
